scripts.copy-config: npx mkdirp dist/config && cp -f src/config/config.json dist/config
scripts.prebuild-config:local: npx mkdirp src/config && cp src/environments/overrideConfigs/config-local.json src/config/config-override.json && cp ../configs/hca-fcm-api/application-local.yml src/config/config.yml
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run copy-config && env DB_CONNECTION_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/fcm npx nodemon node dist/server.js
scripts.prebuild-config:docker: npx mkdirp src/config && cp src/environments/overrideConfigs/config-docker.json src/config/config-override.json && cp ../configs/hca-fcm-api/application-docker.yml src/config/config.yml
scripts.start:docker: npm run build && npm run copy-config && env DB_CONNECTION_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/fcm node dist/server.js
